scenario_text.value:
Please, don’t hate me... I don’t want to be
alone...
You’re right. Rejection is really scary.

I’m such a coward...such a liar... I hate
myself...

No, that’s where you’re wrong. I could never
hate myself.

After all, if even I don’t like who I am, how
could anyone else?

Besides, I’ve learned I don’t have to worry
about everyone liking me all the time.

Because I’ve come to trust that my friends
really do care about me!

Now that’s more like it! You’re a good
person, Saki, and everybody likes you!
